title: [Solution] Wayland: fix team scaling on HiDPI + scaling/fractional scaling
body: Hi, I am using this project under [sway](https://github.com/swaywm/sway)/wayland. Also using HiDPI with scaling (eg fractional scale). This is leading to problems with ugly/fuzzy fonts when running on such display. To cure this problem I removed `/usr/bin/teams-for-linux` symlink and put a file there with the following contents: ```bash #!/bin/sh exec /opt/teams-for-linux/teams-for-linux --ozone-platform-hint=wayland "$@" ``` And made this file executable. After this it is starting as native wayland app and fonts/UI is crystal clear :) Maybe this would help someone...
